content.raw: Ok so I changed the way shutter markers work. They now get added for each shot but are hidden. If the user toggles a newly added checkbox they are shown. Since this is now a individual per shot thing I decided to drop the shot colors and make the shutter colors red and green again. Does this solve the coloring concerns you had @pstarkey?
